amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of $40 million for a referendum among the residents of Vieques, Puerto Rico regarding further use of the island training range by the Navy; and require that the President certify that all trespassing and other intrusions on the range have ceased and that comprehensive operational training has resumed before economic development funding of $40 million is made available.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in part B of House Report 106-549 to strike language in the bill that would permit $40 million to be used to fund a binding referendum for economic development in Vieques in Puerto Rico unless specified certifications are made by the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fowler amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 232 (Roll no. 88).
